MainPage.title: We combine education with a career in IT and guaranteed employment.
MainPage.body: Academie One is open for anyone from 18 to 42 and does not require prior knowledge of programming, diploma or certificate. One can change the future - begin today!

PageName.body: «To succeed, planning alone is insufficient. One must improvise as well.»

Message.title: Message
body: The challenges faced by the country are known and well-documented by analysts and media throughout the world. With all-time same story again and again – oil & gas, mining, agriculture, logistics. What is missing though, is a contrarian perspective, which, while recognizing the challenges and risks, also gives a voice to the compelling reasons to consider other sectors of Kazakhstan economy as an investment destination.

With oil prices taking a deep dive and COVID-19 pandemia, Kazakh economy is struggling with no clear perspectives. Though, each crisis opens up opportunities, and the latter is the reason to consider investment opportunity into human talent advancement.

Companies in post-pandemic world will accelerate digitization, while finding the right human talent will represent greater challenge. By 2025, the number of new technology-oriented jobs available in global digital ecosystem is estimated at 149 million, according to a Microsoft study.

We have launched Academie One to discover and advance human talent from Central Asia for the global world. More than 2000 cadets will be integrated at our educational platform supported by Nicolas Sadirac's 01 Edu System.
We believe new generation of developers will benefit from an unprecedented global opportunities 21st century has to offer.

In keeping with what is established in Article 10 of the cited Law, ACADEMIE ONE LLC informs users of the following:

items.title: Users and responsibility regime
items.body: By browsing, accessing and using ACADEMIE ONE LLC’s website, constitutes the person as a user. As a result of browsing ACADEMIE ONE LLC’s website, the said user accepts all the conditions of use established herein, notwithstanding the application of the corresponding obligatory regulations applicable in each case.

PageName.body: To apply, we only ask that you are open-minded, motivated and ready to commit to our 4-year educational and work program program and you must be at least 18.

items.question: What is Academie.one?
items.answer: Anyone over the age of 18 can study at Academie One, with no previous knowledge in the field or any other prerequisites necessary. Upon application, students are given a logic-based test. If successful, students can move to the next step.

items.question: Flexible
items.answer: With revolutionary educational program, students work on projects that interest them in close collaboration with their peers. The Education cluster will be open 7 days a week, 24 hours a day, so cadets will be able to attend classes according to their personal schedule.

items.question: Career
items.answer: The Academie engages cadets in a 4-year collaboration, which includes 2 years of study and 2 years of career development, working on projects in an IT company, after which students become high-quality coders.

PageName.body:
«My philosophy of life is that difficulties vanish when faced boldly»
 ― Isaac Asimov

items.title: For everyone
items.body: Everyone age 18-42 can study at Academie One. Just fill the application and try it yourself.

items.title: Education for challengers
items.body: We believe in high-quality education for those who want to take on challenges, regardless of their background. We help talents to unleash their full creativity.

items.title: Job guaranteed
items.body: The program lasts for four years. After two years of studies, you continue with two-year career development working on global projects.

Hero.h2Title: We combine education with a career and guaranteed employment in IT.
Hero.body: Academie One is open for anyone from 18 to 42 and does not require prior knowledge of programming, diploma or certificate.
Hero.body2: One can change the future - begin today!

FinancialModel.body: We are making significant investments for offering everyone a high-quality education. To reduce the financial barrier to education, we offer a four-year contract - two years of education at the academy and two years of employment at an international outsourcing company based in Almaty. We call it 2+2 investment towards your future.

Edu.body: 01 Edu System is a collaborative education platform to open and run revolutionary coding schools. Its founder Nicolas Sadirac has rigorously designed the curriculum for 20 years to prepare world-class software engineers.

Campus.body: We are located in an old refurbished historical tea packing factory. Feel free to study on our campus equipped with 256 iMacs. Relax from your coding session in the gaming area: play chess, tennis, or PS4. Meditate, stretch or chill in the quiet area. The library is also there for you ;) The campus is open 27/7/365

Cluster.title: Education Cluster
Cluster.body: An educational campus is an open and immersive space designed for a complete and comfortable immersion in the learning process. It is a creative and safe space, equipped with cutting edge technologies that foster collaboration, communication and teamwork. The total area of the academy is 4042 sq. m

Almaty.body: Surrounded by beautiful mountain ranges, it is home to many technology companies and large enterprises. It is ideal for studying and living with excellent infrastructure, stunning views, and warm culture.

PageName.body: Our learning approach involves no teachers, no semesters and no boredom — the program bases on peer learning, individual growth, and lots of practice. By the way, job guaranteed

Peer.body: Collaboration is the foundation of peer learning. Students complete their projects in teams to maximize their creativity.

items.title: Teamwork
items.body: The Peer-to-Peer methodology teaches cadets to work as a team: share information, ideas, and experiences. Be a student and a teacher simultaneously.

items.title: Informal communication
items.body: Students do not talk in their professors' memorized words; instead, they explore the problem and defend their solutions.

items.title: Revealing potential
items.body: This approach helps to maximize students' potential and stimulates curiosity.

items.title: Flexible schedule
items.body: The Education cluster will be open seven days a week, 24 hours a day, so you are free to set your schedule. Cadets usually spend an average of 40 hours per week.

Piscine.title: 1. Pisciner
Piscine.body: The Piscine is the final step to join the academy. You have a will discover the methodology, its unique learning method, and what programming is. It's a chance to know each other better.

items.title: New experience
items.body: Many students consider Piscine to be one of the highlights of their student life. Everyone around you shares a similar vision and passion for learning.

items.title: Growth mindset
items.body: There will be a lot of trial and error to help you better understand the problem. You work by yourself and in groups, ask your peers for help, and help your peers complete projects.

Cadet.body: The curriculum offers over 100 projects that are consistently updated to reflect the latest industry standards. With ten different learning areas to choose from, students will move through two learning stages at the Academie: fundamentals and specialization.

Portfolio.body: Each project you finish in the curriculum goes to your portfolio, which will project your unique skillset.

Career.body: Once you graduate, Academie One guarantees employment to help you kick-start your career with international projects.

Contract.body: When you sign a contract, you get guaranteed employment and free training. In general, the skills development program lasts four years. The first two years you learn programming skills, and the last two years you build up your portfolio with work projects. The contract provides both parties with a guarantee of future cooperation.

Offer.body: We provide guaranteed employment. This experience can help you in your future employment with other IT companies. The job offer includes such things as a market salary, a comfortable workspace, interesting international projects, lifetime access to Academie One, a social package, and a community of like-minded people and etc.

Alumni.body: Once you finish the program, you have lifetime access to the 01 Edu System platform. You will always stay at a bleeding-edge as Academie One alumni.

items.title: Fundamentals
items.body: The projects you work on will introduce you to the core principles of Computer Science. Rather than a series of languages and specific technologies, we will teach you how to learn effectively. With that knowledge, every new fancy technology will be easy to grasp. We call it skills for a lifetime.

items.title: Specialization
items.body: Once you become more familiar with the basics, you will work on more complex projects in larger teams. It is the perfect time to choose which field you want to specialize in.

Ability.title: Skills of the program
Ability.title2: That employers are looking for in digital world
Ability.body: The program generates a great diversity of co-creative digital talents highly valuable and sought-after to drive innovation and development, in all fields of digital transformation and technology.

PageName.body: Before you can take off with coding at Academie One, you need to take some small steps. Buckle up and let's get started!

items.title: 1. Registration & Interview
items.body: Create an account on the 01 Edu platform and complete two online games. First game takes around 5 minutes to complete. Second is a longer and usually takes 1 hour. `. No coding is required. If you pass the game, you will receive a link for the introduction meeting with Team One.

items.title: 2. Piscine
items.body: Successful candidates who pass the online test will be invited to take the four-week Piscine at Academie One campus. It is the final part of our admission process that introduces you to our educational model.

items.title: 3. Review
items.body: If you are selected for the Cadet program, you will have a month to try the program and decide whether you fit in the academy environment. Enjoy the program? Let's evaluate your offer with us.

ImportantDates.title: Important Dates
body: more dates for Piscines to be announced

PageName.body: For general inquiries, please contact us at contact@academie.one

inquire.body: For press inquiries, contact us at press@academie.one

Brand.body: To Discover, Unite, and Advance talent for global impact.

BrandManifesto.title: Brand Manifesto
body: There's an idea behind our mission that we put into our work. Talent is what drives our society to change. The belief that we can change the future inspires us to change. Talent, when inspired, can change the future. After all, change is constant progress.
We believe that a whole new era awaits, one characterized by equal opportunities for people looking for self-fulfillment because the most valuable resource in the world is people with knowledge.
We aspire to connect local talent to the world. Let's build a digital community that can solve problems and influence change.

items.title: Integrity
items.body: Everything we do, we do in good faith and with honesty

items.title: Inspired
items.body: We do what we love and we do it for a greater idea.

items.title: Creative
items.body: We are creative to make new things and improve existing ones.

items.title: Together
items.body: We do it in cooperation. We are creating a new future opportunity. Each person's contribution is important to the common cause.

items.title: Discovery
items.body: We support the freedom of each person to pursue knowledge and discover new talents.

items.title: Culture
items.body: We create a supportive culture for growth, where everyone can reach their potential.
